metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the sol-def:isainfo_test is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the sol-def:isainfo_test.

notes.note: It is important to note that the values used in this test definition are specific to a particular machine, and may not necessarily apply to your system. As a result, in order to have the definition return a result of 'true', you must either change these values to the ones found on your particular system, or you must configure your system to use these values.

criterion.comment: Test that the isainfo_object is supported by getting the instruction set architecture for a machine.

isainfo_test.comment: Test that the isainfo_object is supported by getting the instruction set architecture for a machine.

isainfo_object.comment: Get instruction set architecture for a machine.

isainfo_state.comment: This state represents a isainfo_item where the bits is any integer, and kernel_isa and application_isa entities match the regular expression '.*'.
